scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:contracts" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:contracts: cd contracts && npm run node & sleep 5 && npm run deploy:local
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:contracts && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.reset: npm run docker:down && docker volume prune -f && npm run docker:up
